title: Mars Transit in the 7th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits your 7th house, energy concentrates on partnerships, agreements, and open confrontations. One-to-one relationships feel intense, with a strong urge to assert dominance or set boundaries. Business dealings and negotiations can become competitive, producing quick progress or sharp conflicts depending on tone. In personal relationships, impatience or ego clashes may surface. This transit favors decisive action in partnerships, provided aggression is replaced with strategic clarity, mutual respect, and controlled responses.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong need to assert position with others

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Arguments may arise in close bonds

closing: This Mars transit tests partnerships through confrontation. Balanced assertion and mutual respect convert conflict into constructive outcomes.
